Empowering zombies are enemies encountered in the Zemouregal & Vorkath fight.

When summoned, they will slowly walk towards Vorkath. If they reach it, they will increase Vorkath's power by 50%, increasing the overall damage of its attacks.

Life points[edit | edit source]

The zombie's life points scale accordingly to the amount of players in the instance when they were summoned.

Players Life points (normal) Life points (hard) Players Life points (normal) Life points (hard) Players Life points (normal) Life points (hard) Players Life points (normal) Life points (hard) Players Life points (normal) Life points (hard)
1 3,000 6,000 2 6,000 12,000 3 9,000 18,000 4 12,000 24,000 5 15,000 30,000
6 18,000 36,000 7 21,000 42,000 8 24,000 48,000 9 27,000 54,000 10 30,000 60,000
